name: HotPlay
description:
Hey! This is the greatest firefighter squad in the whole universe. Meet Chris, Martin, Mary, and Red. Your job (you, yes--you) is to join them in their adventures of fighting fires and saving people in their small, sweet town. It's recommended to play it with your friends (1 - 4 players). The more, the merrier.
